plot: Haunted follows a group of young filmmakers who produce a reality show about the paranormal. Each episode takes you behind the scenes of a paranormal investigation as well as documenting the history of events behind each investigation.
plot_en: Haunted follows a group of young filmmakers who produce a reality show about the paranormal. Each episode takes you behind the scenes of a paranormal investigation as well as documenting the history of events behind each investigation.

title: Haunted
